entry.title: 用Excel进行霍尔特（holt）双参数指数平滑分析
爬取肯德基全国的门店
entry.content: 知识体系：ajax-get 工具：urllib库和fiddler4抓包 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132import urllib.requestimport urllib.parsecity = input("请输入查询的城市：")page = int(input("请输入查询的页码：")) #一定要取整，否则input返回的是str，后果不堪设想pagesize = int(input("请输入每页的门店数量："))url = "http://www.kfc.com.cn/kfccda/ashx/GetStoreList.ashx?op=cname"#这部分直接复制粘贴fidder4抓包的json文件request的Webform部分data = {'op':'cname','cname':city,'pid':'', 'pageIndex':page,'pageSize':pagesize} data = urllib.parse.urlencode(data).encode()#这部分直接复制粘贴fidder4抓包json文件的request raw部分header = {'Connection': 'keep-alive','Accept': 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01','Origin': 'http://www.kfc.com.cn','X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest','User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/69.0.3497.100 Safari/537.36','Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8','Referer': '肯德基餐厅信息查询','Accept-Language': 'zh-CN,zh;q=0.9','Cookie':'ASP.NET_SessionId=w4hdm3b5ucitqmv5l11mwov5; WT_FPC=id=2dcee04e3846751c6ff1552059570584:lv=1552059570585:ss=1552059570584; Hm_lvt_1039f1218e57655b6677f30913227148=1552059571; Hm_lpvt_1039f1218e57655b6677f30913227148=1552059571; KLBRSID=a34b6eb1eda6f7a05724ede2e440cdc7|1552059674|155209568'}request = urllib.request.Request(url = url,headers = header)response = urllib.request.urlopen(request,data)print(response.read().decode())

entry.title: 今天来试一下，科赫小雪花
entry.content: 今天尝试用python的turtle包画了一下科赫小雪花 效果如图： 123456789101112131415161718192021import turtle as tdef koch(size,n): if n==0: t.fd(size) else: for angle in [0,60,-120,60]: t.left(angle) koch(size/3,n-1)t.setup(800,400)t.penup()t.goto(-500,150)t.pd()t.pensize(2)koch(400,3)t.right(120)koch(400,3)t.right(120)koch(400,3)t.right(120)t.hideturtle()t.done()

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
